videos.headline: Virginia QB underthrows wide-open WR
videos.description: Virginia QB Bryce Perkins airs it out to Tavares Kelly, who drops the underthrown pass with no defenders around him.

videos.headline: Virginia Tech WR snags unbelievable one-handed TD
videos.description: Virginia Tech QB Ryan Willis lofts a back-shoulder fade to Tre Turner, who leaps and snatches an incredible one-handed 7-yard touchdown.

videos.headline: Virginia Tech blocks punt for TD
videos.description: Virginia Tech returns a Tre Turner blocked punt for a touchdown in the possession following he had a one-handed touchdown catch.

videos.headline: Virginia WR hauls in ridiculous one-handed TD
videos.description: Virginia answers VT with a one-handed touchdown of its own as Joe Reed reels in a marvelous 29-yard touchdown from Bryce Perkins.

videos.headline: Reed dashes 75 yards to house for Virginia TD
videos.description: Virginia WR Joe Reed snags a quick out from Bryce Perkins, makes a defender miss and zooms to the end zone for a 75-yard touchdown.

videos.headline: Hokies extend lead with rush TD
videos.description: Virginia Tech extends its lead over Virginia to 24-14 as Deshawn McClease cuts to the edge and rumbles for a 2-yard touchdown.

videos.headline: Virginia RB slices in for 12-yard TD
videos.description: Virginia RB Jordan Ellis takes the handoff and makes multiple Hokies' defenders miss en route to a 12-yard touchdown.

videos.headline: UVA takes fourth-quarter lead on Perkins' TD toss
videos.description: Virginia QB Bryce Perkins threads the needle to Hasise Dubois for a 29-yard touchdown to give the Cavaliers a 28-24 lead.

videos.headline: Virginia defensive lineman intercepts Willis
videos.description: Hokies QB Ryan Willis is picked off by Charles Snowden, who bats the pass and reels in the interception deep in Virginia Tech territory.

videos.headline: Hokies tie game on wild fumble TD
videos.description: Virginia Tech RB Steven Peoples fumbles before he reaches the end zone, but teammate Hezekiah Grimsley pounces on the loose ball for a touchdown to tie the game at 31-31.
